review_title: Cannot play boogeyman 2 on oculus quest2
one_reviews_text: I cannot get this game to load with the Oculus quest 2 and I believe because it is setup for the rift. I thought the rift library of games would be available for the quest 2 through the quest link. My quest link cable works great for DCS flight sim which I'd why I purchase the quest 2. The game will pop up on my quest 2 but i lose connection with the link every time.

Does not even load , CAN WE FIX THIS
Update* Loaded today but when I start a new game it just shows loading 
#CRAP
This game looks so good and so spooky! Once i played it i couldn't play! I hope they fix it

I am giving 2 stars only because when I briefly got to see the graphics, the game looks cool and spooky. But it only started once and then froze. Now it only has a loading hour glass on the title screen. Not sure why, I really want to play it. I hope they fix this issue soon!
Would definetely sh!t again tho ;)

This darn game won't start. Bought it two or three months ago, figured they'd fix it by now. Still won't start. Broken games like these affect the quality of Oculus store overall. They should force developers to make software that actually work, or take the thing off the store all together.
not worth your money

review_title: This is wrong to sell if it's broke
one_reviews_text: I have purchased this game with the $15.00 Credit from Oculus and I have yet to be able to play this game, what gives?? I have been start at the start screen for 40 minutes now!!! Not happy with this at all.....

review_title: Rated ~4.83/5 by those who DID play it.
one_reviews_text: SO UNFAIR !!! Of the hundreds of buyers only 10 voted, and 4 of them voted 1-star only because they couldn't fix their rare launch problem... so remove those 4 votes and this game is in fact rated 4.83/5 stars by the 6 users who DID play it. I fixed that launch problem ~2% of the players were having by switching both .EXE to Windows 7 compatibility, launching it once (works but no VR), then switching Windows 7 compatibility back off permanently (problem is fixed). My rating is 4 stars and i'm adding 1 star for how affordable it is, and because those few but harmfull 1-star votes are from a handful of users who would love to be able to play it too (or simply forgot to update their vote after it was solved for them).
Quite scary but lots of fun to play with friends over.

review_title: CAN'T GET THE GAME TO WORK?
one_reviews_text: Contact the developer who will give you a steam key, which actually works. ClockworkWolfGames@gmail.com

review_title: game stoped working after first try
one_reviews_text: played first game, loved it, goto night 4, now the game wont load up, freezes on loading screen, same problems as coment below, update..uninstalled, reinstalled and it worked, competed level four, crashing going to the next level, hour glass just sits there....another update, i contacted them on facebook, they replyed the same day, they are going to look into it and have given me a free steam key to redownload. new update, after great feed back from the team, they have sorted it for me, working on steam great now, thanks.
review_feedback:
It appears a minor (2 out of 130)  number of users are having some issues with crashing occurring.

If you are one of them please send an email to ClockworkWolfGames@gmail.com and i'll send you a Steam key for free. (Oculus VR runs perfectly on it).

Sorry for any frustration, i'll keep trying to fix this for those affected.

review_title: Maybe ok for HTC, Oculus stay away!!!
one_reviews_text: Controller doesnt respond the way it supposed to, neither rift controllers or xbox
review_feedback:
Hello, Only the right Oculus touch is needed for walking (analogue stick) and the flashlight (trigger) / A to recharge / B for menu.

Make sure you are centred / stood or sat correctly to the HMD origin when walking otherwise you will not rotate correctly. (Walking is only needed for the menu system and intro. The game is primarily stationary.

The left touch controller does not work / is unneeded.
The Xbox controller is also not supported as 9/10 users have a touch, and the touch is much better to use for the flashlight mechanic :)

If enough people want Xbox controller support as in the original, I will find a way to add it.

Note: You will acquire the flashlight after the introduction level.

one_reviews_text: the game blocks before playing !
review_feedback:
Hello just to clarify that 300 people have successfully  played the game without any issues. Around 6 - 8 people have had issues with loading / crashing.

I have recently updated the game with a patch that should have hopefully fixed this issue for those with the problem. I am guessing it's to do with slow internet / Oculus server response time as every time the game transitioned into a new level it would perform an entitlement check. I have now changed this so it only performs the check once at the boot up of the game. (Which as far as I'm aware no one had issues with initial boot).

If anyone is still having any loading issues with the game please let me know.

Support@ClockworkWolfGames.com

one_reviews_text: This worked only the first time I ran it. It constantly gets suck on a loading screen and then it eventually crashes.
